channel.title: Fight Pits! (video inside)
channel.description:
I decided to code the fight pits... its not perfected but its good enough for a release.... type ::pits to get to the pits. ::openpits to let people into the pits. ::shutpits to start the pits and ::openpits once again to let people in and disable attacking. If you die you do NOT lose items. You get 2k tokkul (might make full pits with shops ect, still deciding though ) and you wait till the next round to fight again.
Lemme know what everyone thinks about this... what could be updated... what you like about it... If its liked enough i'll release it sometime...
heres the video of it (hosted on 2 sites)
[code]http://media.putfile.com/fightpits or http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yZzRrbxDDAs[/code]
i suggest using putfile, when the movie is loaded right click >zoom > full screen so you can see the movie better
btw this is for testscape currently... if i release it i'll get it working for project 16, and hybridscape also...

Mayby Think before you post.
